comment: At 5:06 the Range should be 0 to (2^n) - 1 and not 2^(n-1) That's how it is 0 to 15 for 4 bit binary number (i.e, (2^4)-1 = 15)
I think there is a mistake the range for unsigned numbers should be 2^(n)-1 and not 2^(n-1)
